name: Chuusotsu! 1st Graduation: Time After Time
description: Chuusotsu! is a fun, colorful story of three girls brought by their individual circumstances to live under the same roof and being forced to tackle existential questions to win their place in society.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800MHz or higher Graphics: 1280x720 Display or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Pentium III 2GHz or higher Graphics: 1280x720 Display or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
